branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - Basic Type
branchCategory.description: <p>The rodless cylinder, basic type can be combined with a variety of guides to accommodate&nbsp;conditions. &nbsp;This is a simple design without guides to facilitate space savings.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - Basic Type

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY3*, Mechanically Jointed - Basic Type
branchItem.description: <p>Rodless Cylinders, MY3* have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a lowest profile in mechanical jointed rodless cylinders.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1B-*Z, Mechanically Jointed w/, w/o Stroke Adjuster - Basic Type
branchItem.description: <p>Rodless Cylinders, MY1B-*Z have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile.  End of stroke adjusters are available with these series.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1B-Z, Mechanically Jointed Low/High Load Shock Absorber - Basic Type
branchItem.description: <p>Rodless Cylinders, MY1B-L*Z &amp; MY1B-H*Z&nbsp;have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a shock absorber at the end of stroke for greater kinetic energy absorption.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1B, Mechanically Jointed, Standard Bores - Basic Type
branchItem.description: <p>Rodless Cylinders, MY1B have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. Air cushions are standard and external shock absorbers are optional.</p>
